page.title: 16HEALTH AND BEAUTY FARM
page.content: The farmhouse of Little Baldon Farm has been converted to a non-residential beauty farm. It provides excercise,and beauty treatments. It is not a club, anyone may make an appointment. There is a gymnasium with weight lifting and excercise gear. Nearby is a sauna and shower. The oak floored dining-room is used for keep-fit. Upstairs is a hairdresser,solarium and steam-bath. There is a massage room with an expert masseuse and beauty rooms for facials, make-up, pedicures and manicures. The house,parts of which are Tudor, has maintained much of its original character and sits in immaculate walled gardens.
